00146 int nfs_Link( nfs_arg_t               * parg,    
00147               exportlist_t            * pexport, 
00148               fsal_op_context_t             * pcontext,   
00149               cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00150               hash_table_t            * ht,
00151               struct svc_req          * preq,    
00152               nfs_res_t               * pres ) 
00153 {
00154   static char     funcName[] = "nfs_Link";
00155     
00156   char                    * str_link_name = NULL ;
00157   fsal_name_t               link_name         ;
00158   cache_entry_t           * target_pentry     ;
00159   cache_entry_t           * parent_pentry     ;
00160   cache_inode_status_t      cache_status      ;
00161   int                       rc                ;
00162   fsal_attrib_list_t      * ppre_attr         ;
00163   fsal_attrib_list_t        parent_attr       ;
00164   fsal_attrib_list_t        target_attr       ;
00165   fsal_attrib_list_t        attr              ;
00166   fsal_attrib_list_t        attr_parent_after ;
00167   cache_inode_file_type_t   parent_filetype   ;
00168   cache_inode_file_type_t   target_filetype   ;
00169   short                     to_exportid       ;
00170   short                     from_exportid     ;
00171   
00172         if (preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3)
00173     {
00174       /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00175       pres->res_link3.LINK3res_u.resfail.file_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00176       pres->res_link3.LINK3res_u.resfail.linkdir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00177       pres->res_link3.LINK3res_u.resfail.linkdir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00178       ppre_attr = NULL;
00179     }
00180 
00181   /* Get entry for parent directory */
00182   if( ( parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00183                                             &(parg->arg_link2.to.dir),
00184                                             &(parg->arg_link3.link.dir),
00185                                             NULL, 
00186                                             &(pres->res_stat2),
00187                                             &(pres->res_link3.status),
00188                                             NULL,
00189                                             &parent_attr, 
00190                                             pcontext, 
00191                                             pclient, 
00192                                             ht, 
00193                                             &rc ) ) == NULL )
00194     {
00195       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00196       return rc ;
00197     }
00198   ppre_attr = &parent_attr ;
00199   
00200   if( ( target_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00201                                             &(parg->arg_link2.from),
00202                                             &(parg->arg_link3.file),
00203                                             NULL, 
00204                                             &(pres->res_stat2),
00205                                             &(pres->res_link3.status),
00206                                             NULL,
00207                                             &target_attr, 
00208                                             pcontext, 
00209                                             pclient, 
00210                                             ht, 
00211                                             &rc ) ) == NULL )
00212     {
00213       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00214       return  rc ;
00215    }
00216 
00217   /* Extract the filetype */
00218   parent_filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( parent_attr.type ) ;
00219   target_filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( target_attr.type ) ;
00220   
00221         /*
00222          * Sanity checks: 
00223          */
00224         if( parent_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING && parent_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE )
00225     {
00226       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00227         {
00228         case NFS_V2:
00229           pres->res_stat2 = NFSERR_NOTDIR;
00230           break;
00231         case NFS_V3:
00232           pres->res_link3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR;
00233           break; 
00234         }
00235       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00236     }
00237   
00238         switch (preq->rq_vers)
00239         {
00240         case NFS_V2:
00241                 {
00242                         str_link_name = parg->arg_link2.to.name;
00243       to_exportid   = nfs2_FhandleToExportId( &(parg->arg_link2.to.dir) ) ;
00244       from_exportid = nfs2_FhandleToExportId( &(parg->arg_link2.from) ) ;
00245                         break;
00246                 }
00247         case NFS_V3:
00248                 {
00249                         str_link_name = parg->arg_link3.link.name;
00250       to_exportid   = nfs3_FhandleToExportId( &(parg->arg_link3.link.dir) ) ;
00251       from_exportid = nfs3_FhandleToExportId( &(parg->arg_link3.file ) ) ;
00252                         break;
00253                 }
00254         }
00255   
00256         if (str_link_name == NULL || strlen( str_link_name ) == 0)
00257     {
00258       if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V2 ) pres->res_stat2        = NFSERR_IO ;
00259       if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3 ) pres->res_link3.status = NFS3ERR_INVAL ;
00260     } 
00261   else
00262     {
00263       /*
00264        * Both objects have to be in the same filesystem 
00265        */
00266       
00267       if (to_exportid != from_exportid)
00268         {
00269           if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V2 ) pres->res_stat2        = NFSERR_PERM ;
00270           if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3 ) pres->res_link3.status = NFS3ERR_XDEV ;
00271         } 
00272       else
00273         {
00274           /* Make the link */
00275           if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert( FSAL_str2name( str_link_name, 
00276                                                                          FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN,
00277                                                                          &link_name ) ) ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00278             {
00279               if( cache_inode_link( target_pentry, 
00280                                     parent_pentry,
00281                                     &link_name,
00282                                     &attr, 
00283                                     ht, 
00284                                     pclient, 
00285                                     pcontext, 
00286                                     &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00287                 {
00288                   if( cache_inode_getattr( parent_pentry, 
00289                                            &attr_parent_after,
00290                                            ht,
00291                                            pclient, 
00292                                            pcontext, 
00293                                            &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00294                     {
00295                       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00296                         {
00297                         case NFS_V2:
00298                           pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00299                           break;
00300                           
00301                         case NFS_V3:
00302                           /*
00303                            * Build post op file
00304                            * attributes 
00305                            */
00306                           
00307                           nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00308                                              target_pentry, 
00309                                              &attr,
00310                                            &(pres->res_link3.LINK3res_u.resok.file_attributes) );
00311                           
00312                           /*
00313                            * Build Weak Cache Coherency
00314                            * data 
00315                            */
00316                           nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00317                                           parent_pentry, 
00318                                           ppre_attr, 
00319                                           &attr_parent_after,
00320                                           &(pres->res_link3.LINK3res_u.resok.linkdir_wcc));
00321                           
00322                           pres->res_link3.status = NFS3_OK;
00323                           break;
00324                         } /* switch */
00325                       
00326                       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00327                       
00328                     } /* if( cache_inode_link ... */
00329                 } /* if( cache_inode_getattr ... */
00330             } /* else */
00331         }
00332     }
00333   
00334   /* If we are here, there was an error */
00335   if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status) )
00336     {
00337       return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00338     }
00339   
00340         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00341                        preq->rq_vers, 
00342                        cache_status,
00343                        &pres->res_stat2,
00344                        &pres->res_link3.status,
00345                        target_pentry,
00346                        &(pres->res_link3.LINK3res_u.resfail.file_attributes),
00347                        parent_pentry,
00348                        ppre_attr,
00349                        &(pres->res_link3.LINK3res_u.resfail.linkdir_wcc),
00350                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00351 
00352         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00353 } /* nfs_Link */
00354 
00363 void nfs_Link_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00364 {
00365   /* Nothing to do here */
00366   return ;
00367 } /* nfs_Link_Free */
